testcase.classname: Simple login page where user performs positive and negative login test cases
testcase.name: mock login credentials - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user type valid student Password123 and click submit...................passed And verify page URL, expected text and click logout.........................passed When user type invalid incorrectUser Password123 and click submit...........passed Then verify error message...................................................passed When user type invalid student incorrectPassword and click submit...........passed Then verify error message...................................................passed
